short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way to get a link into your smartphone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need to open the same url you just opened on your computer on your smartphone? Just scan the QR code. I wouldn't say it's a revolutionary idea but it saved me a headache or two.
